name: nothing-ben
description: Ben bot Is a Simple WA Bot Using Library Baileys

CAPTION_VIDEO.description: Enter text for captain for all video audio ..... bla bla bla

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. You can set `all | . | .!*`

ANTIBOT.description: Set true to Automatically deletes bot commands sent by users and warns them.

ANTIBOT_REMOVE.description: Set true to Deletes bot commands and instantly removes the user from the group.

ANTIBOT_WARN.description: Set true to Deletes bot commands, warns the user up to 3 times, and removes them after the 3rd warning.

ANTILINK.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing links and warns the user.

ANTILINKREMOVE.description: Set true to Deletes link messages and instantly removes the user.

ANTILINKWARN.description: Set true to Warns the user up to 3 times for sending links before removal.

ANTIBAD.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing bad words and warns the user.

ANTIBAD_REMOVE.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing bad words and instantly removes the user.

ANTIBAD_WARN.description: Set true to Warns the user up to 3 times for using bad words before removal.

AUTO_DL.description: Set true to Automatically downloads media (Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube) from specific link.

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true to auto-react to messages.

WELCOME.description: Put 'false' or 'true' to enable or disable WELCOME.

CHATBOT.description: Set to true if you want your bot to autoreply messages.

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Set to true if you want the bot to read all messages.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma like 93730285765,93744215959.... ",").

PUBLIC.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private. If it is private, then only the bot number can use it. If public, then everyone can use it.
